answer: System performance issue: restart, check CPU/RAM, free disk space, close startup apps, run remediation.
Wi-Fi issue: forget network, reconnect, flush DNS, reboot, try another access point.
VPN issue: verify internet, check date/time, restart VPN client, reload profile.
Outlook sync: restart outlook, update folder, repair profile, check mailbox size.
Smart card: reinsert, try new port, restart service, reboot device.
Installation failure: approve software, run as admin, clear temp, review error code.
Patch failed: reboot, retry update, run troubleshooter, check compliance portal.
